title: Confidence Interval Conclusion
question_text:
You come across this confidence interval:
$$50\pm2.492\lgroup\dfrac{6}{\sqrt{25}}\rgroup=(47.01,52.99)$$
Which of the following is a correct conclusion?

choices.text:
We are
98
%
confident that the this confidence interval contains the population mean of
50

We know that
98
%
of the time this confidence interval contains all
25
values.

We are confident that
98
%
of the time this confidence interval is correct.

We are
98

confident that the this confidence interval captures the population mean.

confident that the this confidence interval captures the population mean.
